Html:
I try to activate gridlines when printing.

From the documentation 1.8.0

4.3.11. Show/hide gridlines when printing
To show/hide gridlines when printing, use the following code:
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setShowGridlines(true);

I actually think this should be
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setPrintGridlines(true);

can you confirm this?
kind regards
Ruediger
